snippet.title: We Are Screwed! - Trailer
snippet.description:
WISHLIST on Steam: https://bit.ly/2Z6h3mF - Be the first to play it: https://discord.gg/rarebyte

The multiverse is in danger! Alone or in a team of up to 4 people, slide into the pilot’s seat, operate a turret, become a mechanic or even a janitor. There is a lot to do and no time to lose! Jump in and go above and beyond, where no one has ever screwed up before!

More info: https://WeAreScrewedgame.com

Follow us:
https://www.tiktok.com/@wearescrewedgame
https://twitter.com/RarebyteGameDev
https://fb.com/rarebyte
https://instagram.com/rarebyte
